Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core

Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter

package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter
Built-in Metaschema data types.

These built-in data types align with the data types defined by Metaschema.

This package provides abstract implementation classes for different kinds of IDataTypeAdapter, which must be implemented by a new date type to be used in this API.
